SEARCH

Class Canvas

java.lang.Object
Canvas
public class Canvas extends Object
Object representing the Canvas which contains Shapes are drawn on.

Canvas is implemented by a single ArrayList<Shape>, which Shapes can be added to, removed from, or cleared out of.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Canvas()
    Constructs default canvas with no Shapes contained within.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(Shape shape)
    Adds the given Shape to the Canvas.
    void
    clear()
    Clear the canvas of all shapes by re-creating a new and empty ArrayList<Shape>.
    Shape
    get(int index)
    Retrieve from Canvas the Shape object stored at the given index; throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of bounds.
    double
    getAreaOfAllShapes()
    Returns the sum of the area of all Shape objects contained in this Canvas object.
    ArrayList<Circle>
    getCircles()
    Returns a ArrayList<Circle> of all the Circle objects currently contained in this Canvas object.
    ArrayList<ConvexPolygon>
    getConvexPolygons()
    Returns a ArrayList<ConvexPolygon> of all the ConvexPolygon objects currently contained in this Canvas object.
    ArrayList<Rectangle>
    getRectangles()
    Returns a ArrayList<Rectangle> of all the Rectangle objects currently contained in this Canvas object.
    ArrayList<Shape>
    getShapesByColor(Color color)
    Returns a ArrayList<Shape> of all the Shape objects that match the given Color that are currently contained in this Canvas object.
    ArrayList<Triangle>
    getTriangles()
    Returns a ArrayList<Triangle> of all the Triangle objects currently contained in this Canvas object.
    Shape
    remove(int index)
    Removes the Shape at the specified index and returns a reference to it, or null if the index is out of bounds.
    int
    size()
    Returns the number of Shapes currently contained in this Canvas object.

    • remove

      public Shape remove(int index)
      Removes the Shape at the specified index and returns a reference to it, or null if the index is out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the Shape to remove
      Returns:
      removed Shape

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the canvas of all shapes by re-creating a new and empty ArrayList<Shape>.

    • get

      public Shape get(int index)
      Retrieve from Canvas the Shape object stored at the given index; throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the Shape object to retrieve from Canvas
      Returns:
      Shape object at the given index, if the index was valid

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of Shapes currently contained in this Canvas object.
      Returns:
      number of Shape objects in the Canvas

    • getShapesByColor

      public ArrayList<Shape> getShapesByColor(Color color)
      Returns a ArrayList<Shape> of all the Shape objects that match the given Color that are currently contained in this Canvas object.
      Parameters:
      color - Color to retrieve the Shapes by
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Shape> of Shape objects in Canvas that have the given Color
